assetProfile.longBusinessSummary: JSW Energy Limited, an integrated power company, generates and sells power in India. The company has a power generation capacity of 4,559 MW, which includes 3,158 MW of thermal, 1,391 MW of hydel, and 10 MW of solar. It has operations in the States of Karnataka, Maharashtra, Rajasthan, and Himachal Pradesh. The company also engages in power transmission and trading activities; and coal mining in South Africa. JSW Energy Limited was founded in 1994 and is based in Mumbai, India.
